segments.text: Hi , my name is Violet . Come with me , and I'll help you wash your hair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My hair is kind of dry and brittle ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll pick a shampoo that's just right for your hair type . Sit right here , and rest your neck on the side of the sink . Is the water too hot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me know if I'm using too much force .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ! You're all set ! Come back with me to your seat , and Eva will be right with you .
segments.speaker: S1
